Title: Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson: The Acquaintance
Actors: Vasiliy Livanov, Vitali Solomin, Rina Zelyonaya, Igor Efimov
Plot: Doctor Watson moves in with the eccentric Sherlock Holmes and they get a case to solve. A young heiress seeks Holmes' help when she feels threatened by her brutish stepfather after her sister dies under mysterious circumstances.
